channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AL
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for AL

item.title: Report X-2023091048
item.description:
Report X-2023091048

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-27T18:13:30+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-13
  • City: BIRMINGHAM
  • State: AL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was put on belt for van load upside down and packages were stacked on top of the package. When found leaking, package was sat up right and put on a pallet by itself. DescribePack: The liquid that leaked from the box put a hole in the box just above the bottle that was discovered leaking. DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: Box was sat up right. The leak did not go past affecting the box.

item.title: Report X-2023081400
item.description:
Report X-2023081400

  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0

  • Description: RESPONDER RESPONDED TO PACKAGE WEARING PROPER PPE, DECISION TREE IN HAND. USING APPROPRIATE RESPONSE SHEET. RESPONDER CONTAINED LEAKER AND TRANSPORTED TO DMP FOR FURTHER PROCESSING.
